apply: Apply to be part of the team
title: Student team at the Polytechnic of Turin
paragraph: We do Bitcoin education and development
popup-paragraph: Unfortunately, we have some bureaucracy to follow. Please get in touch with our President Francesco
alt-img-1: BitGeneration is back, and this year it’s open to everyone! Lessons will take place in person at the Polytechnic University of Turin and can also be attended online. The perfect program for a complete understanding of Bitcoin!
alt-img-2: BitPolito will be attending BTC Prague 2025, the largest Bitcoin event in Europe, from June 19 to 21! Join us to listen to speeches and network with industry experts. Use the promo code «BITPOLITO» to get a 10% discount.
alt-img-3: Turtlecute, Giorgio Rasetto, and Gabriele Vernetti discuss Bitcoin mining, exploring its potential and future developments. Join us in person at the Polytechnic University of Turin or watch the recording online.
alt-img-4: New partnership for BitPolito: Braiins has gifted us a MiniMiner! We'll use it to experiment with mining. Get yours with the code BITPOLITO and enjoy a 10% discount.
